DbDetails.DbTable: (SELECT getChildBoms(%{item_id_m},%{org_id}) boms) t,bom_line bl JOIN item cp ON bl.component_item_id_m=cp.item_id_m LEFT JOIN subinventory sbi ON sbi.subinventory_id=IFNULL(bl.supply_sub_inventory,cp.receipt_sub_inventory) left join uom on cp.uom_id=uom.uom_id JOIN bom_header bh ON bl.bom_header_id=bh.bom_header_id AND cp.org_id=bh.org_id LEFT JOIN bom_routing_header brh ON bh.item_id_m=brh.item_id_m AND bh.org_id=brh.org_id LEFT JOIN bom_routing_line brl ON brl.bom_routing_header_id=brh.bom_routing_header_id AND brl.routing_sequence=bl.routing_sequence AND brl.routing_seq_num=bl.routing_seq_num LEFT JOIN bom_standard_operation stdop ON brl.standard_operation_id=stdop.bom_standard_operation_id JOIN item i ON bh.item_id_m=i.item_id_m AND bh.org_id=i.org_id left join onhand_summary_v oh on oh.item_id_m=cp.item_id_m and oh.org_id=cp.org_id LEFT JOIN option_line wsp ON wsp.option_line_id=ifnull(bl.wip_supply_type,cp.wip_supply_type)

(SELECT getChildBoms(%{item_id_m},%{org_id}) boms) t,( SELECT NULL product,bh.item_id_m,bh.bom_header_id,bh.org_id FROM bom_header bh LEFT JOIN bom_line bl ON (bh.item_id_m=bl.component_item_id_m) LEFT JOIN bom_header bh0 ON bh.org_id=bh0.org_id AND bh0.bom_header_id=bl.bom_header_id WHERE bh0.item_id_m IS NULL UNION SELECT item_id_m,component_item_id_m,bl.bom_header_id,org_id FROM bom_line bl JOIN bom_header bh ON bh.bom_header_id=bl.bom_header_id ) tt JOIN item i ON tt.item_id_m=i.item_id_m AND tt.org_id=i.org_id
